Name: Hope Trigger
About the game: “ This is a beautiful country, where people always have a smiling face. It is also a high-tech country with world-class alchemy and magic. But it had fallen on the night of the barbarian invasion, they betrayed the oath. I've lost people and country and was imprisoned in the dark. ” The story started a thousand years ago, an ancient prosperous civilization ended overnight, leaving nothing but ruins. Today, after a thousand years, a girl comes here and meets another girl who claims to be the queen of the subjugation. They will discover the secret of the subjugation, but all this only happened in…. ======================================================== Game System: A.Battle: 1.Original Sin: A total of 7 original sin series attack combos, you can equip these attack combo freely. 2.Magic : Various magic, you can equip variety of different attributes to overcome all crises. 3.Parry and Counterattack: You can parry the enemy attack, and then give the enemy a deadly counterattack. 4.Ukehi :With the Ukehi you will get dozens of buffs to power up and to assist adventure. B. Adventure: 1 Explore : Various areas for you to explore, and many treasures are waiting for you to find. 2.Gathering and Making : Gathering various materials to make equipment or food to powerful yourself. 3.Quests : There are various people in this world. Help them and listen their story. C. Growth system : 1.Alchemy: Eight different types of alchemy, you can use these to make the enchanting jewels and create your battle style. 2.Arcana : When you explore the dungeon, you may find the items to unlock Arcana passive ability which can strength yourself. D.Ark: 1.Experiment: You are an experimental living organism finding a way to avoid the end of the world in the world of memory. 2.Permadeath : The experimental living organism is very vulnerable, it can not survive multiple deaths in the world of memory, if it occurs, your items, enchanting jewels, level... etc. will disappear. Please be careful when you adventure. 3.Alpha-Omega : The hardware of Ark laboratory upgrades can assist experimental living organism to endure multiple deaths. ======================================================== Game features : 1.You can equip two different attack combos, and switch between them in battle. You will use various weapons in the combo and use it to defeat various enemies, and experience a magnificent battle 2.Unique the magic system, to get the red elements from the enemy, when it full, using it to trigger the magic energy, and then start the spell to attack enemy. 3.Abundant the enchanting system. You can get various materials by defeating the enemies to make the enchanting jewels, equip these to enhance the ability or get special skill. there are many enchanting jewels in the creating list, you can create their own style of play through enchanting system. 4.Thrilling adventure, looking for the enemy's flaws, using the limited resources to avoid permadeath. =========================================== We highly recommend playing Hope Trigger with a controller. ===========================================
